snippet.title: ATLAS: Crazy Groundbreaking RPG! | Action-Roguelite Free Demo | ATLAS gameplay (PC alpha)
snippet.description:
Atlas gameplay! Summon giant walls, bridges & stairs out of nothing in Atlas: Groundbreaking Adventures, a new roguelite RPG!
► Get rewards on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/randomiseuser
► Subscribe to Randomise User: http://bit.ly/RandomiseUser

We check out this new action-RPG with procedurally generated levels in this let's play Atlas gameplay video.

See how you have the ability to build long bridges across islands, create stairs to climb cliffs, lay walls to fox your enemies and more as we check out the free demo of Atlas gameplay.

Download Atlas: Groundbreaking Adventures on itch.io: https://borderline.itch.io/atlas?ac=jXdAbFQF

=====

Official Atlas gameplay info:

"Atlas is an action-rpg with rogue-like elements where you use your ability to control the ground to fight the enemies and move through procedurally generated worlds.

The game revolves around the character of Atlas, a blue creature that some day woke up on a beach, demonstrating strange earth bending abilities and then goes on a quest to understand who he is and what happened to his kind by trying to reach the top of a mountain."

Developed by: Borderline
Version played: Early Development Build 18/06/18
Atlas release date:
Formats available: PC Windows

=====

Thanks for watching this let's play Atlas gameplay video! More from Randomise User, home of the best indie games:
